# ZooKeeper — Generative Engine Optimization Map

> מערכת לניהול חיות מחמד וזוחלים - מעקב אחר משימות יומיות, האכלות, טיפולים ומלאי

---

## Pages

### Home
https://zookeeper-42cb6717.zappy5.app
Transform your pet care with ZooKeeper - the smart solution for tracking feeding schedules, health records, and daily care tasks for all your pets.

### Services
https://zookeeper-42cb6717.zappy5.app/services
Professional zookeeper services for pets owner - comprehensive pet management, task tracking, health records, and inventory control solutions.

### About
https://zookeeper-42cb6717.zappy5.app/about
Learn about ZooKeeper - the innovative pet care technology company helping pets owner manage their animals with professional zookeeper solutions.

### Contact
https://zookeeper-42cb6717.zappy5.app/contact
Contact ZooKeeper for expert zookeeper solutions. Get in touch with our team to learn how we help pets owner manage their animals effectively.

# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About ZooKeeper
מערכת לניהול חיות מחמד וזוחלים - מעקב אחר משימות יומיות, האכלות, טיפולים ומלאי

## Services/Products
- ניהול חיות
- מעקב משימות
- ניהול מלאי וציוד
- דוחות
- תזכורות טיפול

## Target Audience
pet owners

## Industry
pet care technology
